Name: hai ma
sea horse
hippocamus
Biological: Hippocampus kelloggi Jordanet Snvder (克氏海馬)
Other name: xia gu 蝦姑《海南介語》
ma tou yu 馬頭魚《動物學大辭典》

Dosage: For decoction: 3 to 9 g. Taken in powder form: 1 to 3 g. External use: grind into fine powder.
Samples of Formulae: For impotence or unable to conceive: Hai Ma (seahorse), bake dry and make into powder. Take 3 g each time, 3 times a day with some yellow rice wine.
Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy or in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with high heat. Large dosage and long term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
Research:
Sex hormone effect: the alcohol extract of hai ma can prolong the heat period of female rats, increases the weight of the ovaries and possesses the effect of female hormone. It also can increase the weight of the prostate gland, spermatophore, and levator ani muscles. Its effect is stronger than she chuang zi, yin yang huo, ge jie.

Anti aging effect: hai ma can increase the threshold of mice in lack of oxygen, lower monoamine oxidase, and lower lipid peroxide inside the body.

Anti cancer effect: water decoction of hai long can promote normal people peripheral lymphocyte transformation, can inhibit human cancer cells. It is possible to observe the dissolving of the cancer cells after contacting the extract of hai long. The larger the dosage the larger was the rate of dissolving of the cells and the more obvious was the leaching out of the content of the cancer cells.
Chemical Ingredients: Contains protease, fat, various amino acid and inorganic salt.
Hippocampus histrix Kaup (刺海馬) skin pigments: yellow pigment is γ-carotene; red pigment is astaxanthin and astacene; black pigment is melanin.
Hippocampus histrix Kaup (刺海馬) also contains acetylcholinesterase and cholinesterase.
Hippocampus trimaculatus Leach (三班海馬) contains stearic acid, cholesterol, and 胆甾二醇.
References: [1] 張前進　陝西省中醫學校 (渭南714000)

It also can increase the weight of the prostate gland, spermatophore, and levator ani muscles. Its effect is stronger than she chuang zi,  yin yang huo,  ge jie.anti aging effect: hai ma can increase the threshold of mice in lack of oxygen, lower monoamine oxidase, and lower lipid peroxide inside the body.anti cancer effect: water decoction of hai long can promote normal people peripheral lymphocyte transformation, can inhibit human cancer cells. It is possible to observe the dissolving of the cancer cells after contacting the extract of hai long. The larger the dosage the larger was the rate of dissolving of the cells and the more obvious was the leaching out of the content of the cancer cells.   性激素作用：海馬乙醇提取物能引起與延長雌鼠動情期，增加其卵巢與子宮重量而有雌性激素作用。也能增加雄鼠的前列腺，精囊，提肛肌的重量，亦有雄激素樣作用。其效力較蛇床子，淫羊藿，蛤 蚧強。  抗衰老作用：大海馬能增加小鼠耐缺氧性，降低單胺氧化酶，降低過氧化脂質體內水平。顯明有抗衰老作用。  Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕For impotence or unable to conceive: hai ma, bake dry and make into powder. Take 3 g each time, 3 times a day with some yellow rice wine.陽萎 ﹐ 不孕﹕ 海馬焙乾研為細末 ﹐每服３克 ﹐ 每日３次 ﹐ 黃 酒 沖 服 。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ Contains protease, fat, various amino acid and salt。The yellow color of the skin of Hippocampus histrix Kaup (刺海馬) is γ-carotene, and the red color is astaxanthin, astacene, and the black color is melanin. It also contain acetylcholinesterase, cholinesterase.The Hippocampus trimaculatus Leach  (三班海馬) contains stearic acid, and cholesterol .含蛋白酶 (protease), 脂肪﹐ 多種氨基酸及無機鹽。（1）刺海馬皮肤黄色素為 γ－胡萝卜素（γ-carotene）, 红色素為虾毒素（astaxanthin） 喇蛄素（astacene）,黑色素為黑素（melanin）。并含乙酰胆碱酯酶（acetylcholinesterase）﹐ 胆碱酯酶 (cholinesterase)。（2）三斑海馬  含硬脂酸 （Stearic Acid）﹐膽 固醇 (cholesterol) ﹐胆甾二醇。Dosage:用量: For decoction: 3 to 9 g. Taken in powder form: 1 to 3 g. External use: grind into fine powder．煎湯内服：3 ~ 9 克；或入散劑﹕1 ~ 3 克。外用：研末撒。Cautions:禁忌: Not to use during pregnancy or in cases of yinxu (yin deficient)  with high heat.Large dosage and long term usage can be toxic to kidneys孕婦及陰 虛火 旺者忌服。大劑量與長期服用 ﹐可能對腎臟有毒。  【1】張前進　陝西省中醫學校 (渭南714000)Search this siteProblems with website? Name: an xi xiang
安息香
Botanical: Styrax officinalis (Mediterranean region medicinal benzoin tree)
Chinese: 蘇門答臘安息香（又名印尼安息香）
越南安息香（又名暹羅安息香、泰國安息香）

Geography: Sumatran benzoin (Styrax paralleloneurus Perkins): mainly produced in Sumatra, Indonesia.
Styrax tonkinensis (Pierre) Craib ex Hart.: mainly produced in Thailand and Vietnam.
Styrax hypoglauca Perk.: mainly produced in Hainan, Yunnan, Guangxi, Guangdong provinces of China.
Styrax Macrothyrsus Perk.: mainly produced in Guangxi province of China.
Styrax Subnivea Merr. Et Chun: mainly produced in Hainan, Guangxi, Guangdong provinces of China.
Maladies Treated: Wind-stroke with phlegm syncope (sudden loss of consciousness due to phlegm obstruction during wind-stroke)
Sudden syncope due to qi stagnation and constraint
Pain of the heart and abdomen
Infantile convulsions (pediatric seizure-like episodes due to wind, heat, or fright)
cold type of stomach ache of babies where the babies cries and both legs are curling up (indication of An Xi Xiang Wan)
Dosage: 0.6–1.5 g, mostly being used in pill and powder form.
Samples of Formulae: An Xi Xiang Wan: for cold type of stomach ache of babies where the babies cries and both legs are curling up.
Contraindications: One of the chemical ingredients of an xi xiang benzoic acid (benzene) is toxic. Prolonged exposure to benzoic acid concentrations in excess of 35–100 parts per million in air may lead to symptoms ranging from nausea and excess fatigue to anemia and leukemia.
Notes: The medicinal material is the dried resin (乾燥樹脂) of the respective Styrax species listed.
Chemical Ingredients: Resin: suma resinolic acid (su men resinic acid; sumaresinolic acid).
Resin: coniferyl cinnamate (桂皮酸松柏醇脂).
Original Text:
an xi xiang Linn. ,Complementary and Alternative Healing University

an xi xiang 安息香  
 (in English and Chinese 中英文)
by: Joe Hing kwok Chu
Pharmaceutical name:
英文藥名﹕
Benzoinum Styracis Benzoinis  Benzoinum Styracis Tonkinensis
Botanical name:
學名﹕
Styrax paralleloneurus Perkins
Styrax tonkinensis (Pierre) Craib ex Hart.
Styrax officinalis  （地中海區的藥用安息香樹）
Styrax  Macrothyrsus  Perk.
Styrax   hypoglauca  Perk  (粉背安息香樹)
Pron. in Japanese:
日語發音﹕
ansokuko
Pron. in Korean:
韓語發音﹕
ansohyang

Pron. in Cantonese::
粵音﹕
on1 sik1 hoeng1
Other Names:
別名﹕
kemenyan (Indonesian and Malay name)
Common Name:
英文名﹕
Benzoin
Distribution:
產地﹕
Sumatran benzoin (Styrax paralleloneurus Perkins): mainly produced in Sumatra, Indonesia. 
Styrax tonkinensis  (Pierre) Craib ex Hart. mainly produced in Thailand and Vietnam. 
Styrax  hypoglauca  Perk: mainly produced in Hainan, Yunnan, Guangxi, Guangdong provinces of China. 
Styrax  Macrothyrsus  Perk.: mainly produced in  Guangxi province of China. 
Styrax Subnivea  Merr. Et  Chun: mainly produced in Hainan,  Guangxi, Guangdong provinces of China. 
蘇門答臘安息香(Styrax paralleloneurus Perkins)：又名印尼安息香，為植物安息香樹的乾燥樹脂。主產于印度尼西亞。 
越南安息香 (樹Styrax tonkinensis  (Pierre) Craib ex Hart.)：又名暹羅安息香、泰國安息香，為植物越南安息香的乾燥樹脂。主產於越南、泰國。 
粉背安息香 (樹 Styrax  hypoglauca  Perk.) 主產于我國海南、雲南、廣西、廣東等地。 
青山安息香 (樹Styrax  Macrothyrsus  Perk.) 主產于我國廣西等地。 
白葉安息香 (樹Styrax Subnivea  Merr. Et  Chun) 主產于我國廣西、廣東、海南等地。
Properties
(characteristics)﹕
性味﹕
acrid, bitter, warm
辛、苦、溫。
Channels (meridians) entered: 
歸經﹕
heart, spleen, lung, stomach.
心、脾、肺、胃經
Medical functions:
藥理﹕  
Actions & Indications:
主治﹕
For strokes, shocks, chest pain, epilepsy of children and geriatric asthma.
用於中風痰厥，氣鬱暴厥，心腹疼痛，小兒驚風及老年哮喘
Chemical ingredients:
化學成份﹕
蘇門樹脂酸（sumaresinolicacid）、桂皮酸松柏醇脂（coniferyl cinnamate，lubanyl cin－namate）、苯甲酸（benzoic acid）、桂皮酸（cinnamic acid）
Dosage:
用量﹕
0.6～1.5g, mostly being used in pill and powder form.
0.6～1.5g，多入丸散用。
Samples of formulae
:處方舉例﹕

an xi xiang wan: 
 for cold type of stomach ache of babies where the babies cries and both legs are curling up.

安息香丸: 
治小兒寒性肚痛，雙腿卷起而哭泣。  
Modern Research:
現代研究﹕ 
Toxicity & Cautions:
毒素與禁忌﹕
One of the chemical ingredients of an xi xiang benzoic acid (benzene) is toxic. Prolonged exposure to benzoic acid concentrations in excess of 35�100 parts per million in air may lead to symptoms ranging from nausea and excess fatigue to anemia and leukemia.部份资料來源：《中華本草》

Name: ma bo
馬勃
Botanical: Calvatia lilacina（Mont. et Berk.）Lloyd（紫色馬勃）

Maladies Treated: Wind-heat constraint in the Lung with throat pain (風熱郁肺咽痛).
Bleeding due to injuries (external use) (創傷出血).
Medical Function: Clears the Lung and benefits the throat (清肺利咽).
Antibiotic effect (in vitro): inhibits bacteria including Staphylococcus aureus (金黃色葡萄球菌), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (綠膿桿菌), and Streptococcus pneumoniae (肺炎鏈球菌).
Dosage: 1.5–6 g internally. For external application, use an appropriate amount and apply to the affected area.
Samples of Formulae: Yin Qiao San (銀翹散) [Yin Qiao Powder].
Contraindications:
Not to use for loss of voice due to wind-cold.
Allergic reactions reported: dizziness; throat feels swollen and obstructed; heaviness in chest; skin itchiness and rash.
Research: Antibiotic effect (in vitro): inhibits bacteria including Staphylococcus aureus (金黃色葡萄球菌), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (綠膿桿菌), and Streptococcus pneumoniae (肺炎鏈球菌).
Original Text:
ma bo, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

Name: wu wei zi
Biological: Schisandra chinensis (Turcx.) Baill. (northern wu wei zi 北五味子)
Schisandra sphenanthera Rehd. (southern wu wei zi 南五味子)

Geography: Schisandra chinensis (Turcx.) Baill. (northern wu wei zi 北五味子): Jilin, Liaoning, Heilongjiang, Hebei provinces of China.
Schisandra sphenanthera Rehd. (southern wu wei zi 南五味子): southwestern China and provinces south of the Yangtze (Yang Zi) river of China.
Maladies Treated: spontaneous sweating (自汗); stops instant sweating
Medical Function: helps prevent liver damage; helps to metabolize drugs for liver; lowering ALT and AST. The chemical ingredient, lignan can help regenerate liver tissues due to harmful influence like viruses and alcohol.
helps regulate CNS; improves efficiency of brain activities and improves efficiency of work process
anti hypertension but during exhaustion of circulatory function, it can help to bring up blood pressure
effect on respiratory system: lowers oxygen requirement, correct respiratory exhaustion; works better than Coramine or nikethamide. It helps to expectorate phlegm and sooths coughing
helps the body function to adept stress
induces vascular relaxation via activation of endothelial nitric synthase
has sedative and hypnotic action; helps prevent insomnia
improving the health of the adrenal glands
boosting energy at the cellular level
calms emotion; nourishes the Heart and calms the Shen (養心安神)
Dosage:
Usual dosage: 1.5 to 9 g.
For chronic cough: 1.5 g ~ 3 g.
For tonic: 6 to 9 g.
Boiled with water: 1.5 to 9 g.
Used in powder form: 1 to 3 g (per dose).
Samples of Formulae:
ALT/AST lowering formula: Link was provided on the source page (details not included in the text excerpt).

To improve sperm count and sperm activity: Wu Zi Yan Zong Wan (五子衍宗丸).

For erectile dysfunction (治陽痿): Tu Si Zi (Cuscuta seed) 等分, She Chuang Zi (Cnidium fruit) 等分, Wu Wei Zi (Schisandra fruit) 等分. Grind the three ingredients to powder, bind with honey into pills the size of a wutong seed (蜜丸如梧子). Take 30 pills with drink, three times daily (飲服三十丸，日三). Source: Qian Jin Fang (《千金方》).
Contraindications:
Not to be used by patients with ulcers, or epilepsy, or by those who have over-exercised, or with high pressure in the cranium. Contraindicated when exterior pathogenic factor has not yet been released (表邪未解), in the early stage of cough with internal heat (內有實熱 咳嗽初起), and in the early stage of measles (麻疹初發).
Using Wu Wei Zi together with sulfonamides may cause bleeding in the urinary tract (血尿).
References: Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草
Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中药大辞典

Baill. (northern wu wei zi):in Jilin, Liaoning, Heilongjiang, Hebei provinces of China.Schisandra sphenanthera Rehd. (southern wu wei zi):in south western part of China and in provinces south of Yangtze (Yang Zi) river of China."北五味子" ，主產於中國東北之吉林，遼寧，黑龍江等省與河北省； "南五味子"，主產於西南及長流域以南各省。 Properties (characteristics):性味：warm, sweet, bitter, sour, acrid, salty but prominently sour.性溫，五味(甘苦酸辛鹹)皆具備，但酸 鹹較多   Channels (meridians) entered:歸經：lung, kidney入 肺 ﹐腎 經。Actions & Indications:應 用﹕stops asthmatic cough, helps correct shenxu (kidney deficient)  condition, treats spermatorrhea, stops instant sweating, promotes saliva, quenches thirst, calms emotion, palpitation, helps to prevent insomnia, lower ALT and AST, treats chronic hepatitis.止咳喘 ，滋腎固精 ，治腎 虛遺精 ， 收斂止瀉 ，固 表止汗，治自汗 ，生津止渴 ，養心安神治心悸失眠 。 降轉氨脢 ，治療慢性肝炎 。Medical Function:藥理:　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　1. helps prevent liver damage; helps to metabolize drugs for liver; lowering ALT and AST. The chemical ingredient, lignan can help regenerate liver tissues due to harmful influence like viruses and alcohol.2. anti oxidant3. affect metabolism4. helps regulate CNS; improves efficiency of brain activities and improves efficiency of work process5. anti hypertension but during exhaustion of circulatory function, it can help to bring up blood pressure.6. effect on respiratory system: Lowers oxygen requirement, correct respiratory exhaustion; works better than Coramine or nikethamide. It helps to expectorate phlegm and sooths coughing.7. anti ulcer effect8. helps the body function to adept stress9. antibiotic effect10. anti kidney illness11.  induces vascular relaxation via activation of endothelial nitric synthase.12. lowers cholesterol13. helps prevent insomnia14. reduces nerve pain15. premenstrual syndrome (PMS)16. night sweats , spontaneous sweating17. helps correct erectile dysfunction (ED18. helps correct spermatorrhea19.helps correct  depression, irritability,20. improve  memory21. preventing motion sickness22. counteracting the effects of sugar23. improving the health of the adrenal glands24. boosting energy at the cellular level 　1。 抗肝臟損傷作用 誘導肝臟藥物代謝脢作用﹐ 降血清轉氨脢。其成份之一，木脂素，能修復有害外來影響，如病毒，酒精等損傷的肝臟。2。抗氧化作用3。 影響代謝4。對腦中樞作用﹕(1)能改善大腦調 節功能，增強興奮與抑制過程的靈活性；(2)能 提高智力活動及工作效率；5。對心血管系統作用: 有降壓作用﹐ 但對循環哀竭有生壓作用。6。對呼吸系統作用﹕降低耗氧量﹐增加 潮氣量﹐ 改善呼吸哀竭極為有利﹐優于可 拉明(Coramine, nikethamide).  鎮咳祛痰7。 抗潰瘍作用8。 對機體適應能力作用9。抗菌作用10。抗腎病變作用11。通 過誘導血管舒張內皮一氧化氮合成酶的激活。12。降低膽固醇 13。有鎮靜，催眠作用，而有助於防止失眠 14。降低神經疼痛 15。經前期綜合徵 16。治盜汗，自汗 17。治陽痿 18。治遺精 19。治抑鬱，煩躁不安， 20。提高記憶力 21。防止暈車 22。糖的影響抵消 23。改善腎上腺的健康 24。在細胞水平上提高能源Chemical ingredients:化學成分： 1.Evaporating oil: a-pinene  a-蒎 烯, For tonic: 6 to 9 g.Boiled with water: 1.5 to 9 g.Used in powder form: 1 to 3 g.1.5 ~ 9 克 。水煎 1.5 ~ 9 克 。久咳嗽 1.5 ~ 3 克 。研 末 服 每 次 1- 3 克 。Samples of formulae:處方舉例：Click to see ALT AST lowering formula按此看降 低 ALT 與 AST 之藥方。To improve sperm count and sperm activity: wu zi yan zong wan增加精子數量與活動 力： 五子衍宗丸治陽痿：菟 絲子、蛇 床子、五味子各等分。上三味，末之，蜜丸如梧子。飲服三十丸，日三。《 方源：千金方 》Modern Applications:to be loadedCautions:禁 忌：Not to be used by patients with ulcers, or epilepsy,  or by those over exercise, or with high pressure in the cranium, cold or flu no yet clear, early stage of cough with internal heat, and those with early stage of  measles.Use wu wei zi together with sulfonamides may cause bleeding in the urinary tract.潰瘍或 癲癇發作﹐運動過度﹐顱內高壓之病人禁用。表邪未解 ﹐內有實熱 咳嗽初起 ﹐ 麻疹初發者忌服 。五味子與磺胺類藥 (sulfonamides) 同時使用可能會引起血尿。Source: Zhong Hua Ben Cao  中華本草:；: Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中药大辞典Search this siteProblems with website? Name: ci ji li
bai ji li
Other name: san jiao ma zai 三腳馬仔

Geography: China: northeastern, northern, Qinghai, Xizang (Tibet), along the Yangtze River
Maladies Treated: achy loin due to deficiency (虛勞腰痛)
pink eyes with tears (目赤多淚)
chronic bronchitis with coughing (咳逆肺痿)
bulging sensation in the rib cage/chest and hypochondrium distention (胸脇脹悶)
Medical Function: Soothes the Liver and relieves constraint to rid of depressed mood (平肝解鬱).
Invigorates blood and dispels wind to rid of pain (活血袪風).
Brightens the eyes (明目) and improving vision.

Present day application: reports that body builders are using bai ji li (白蒺藜) to improve results through increasing testosterone; may increase luteinizing hormone which helps development of the corpus luteum in females and production of testosterone by interstitial cells of the testis in males.
Dosage:
Internal (decoction): 6–9 g.
External: smash and apply, or make into powder and sprinkle on affected parts.
Samples of Formulae: For wind rash (風疹) with itchiness: commonly combined with Chan Tui (Cicada slough), Jing Jie (Schizonepeta herb), and Fang Feng (Saposhnikovia root).
Contraindications:
Use with care in cases of blood deficiency and/or qixu (qi deficiency), and during pregnancy.

Toxic reactions: 1) Overdose can cause lack of energy, dizziness, nausea, vomiting, palpitation, rapid respiration, and skin purpura/cyanosis; in serious cases it can cause pulmonary edema and respiratory failure. It can also produce high iron hemoglobin (methemoglobinemia) leading to asphyxia. 2) Allergic reactions: there are reports of skin itchiness, papular rash, and erythema after consuming bai ji li.
Research:
Anti-inflammatory: Tribulus terrestris water extract has anti-inflammatory effects; inhibitory effect on delayed-type hypersensitivity is mainly achieved through mid-term inhibition of effector cell differentiation and formation.

Antihypertensive: Tribulus water extract, ethanol–water extract, and 30% ethanol leaching solution produced antihypertensive effects in anesthetized animals. The alkaloid fraction had no effect on canine blood pressure, but could inhibit frog heart; the water-soluble fraction had moderate antihypertensive effect. [1]

Diuretic: Used as a diuretic in Indian folk medicine. In saline-loading experiments in rats, the diuretic effect was not ideal. The diuretic effect of the ash content water extract and plant decoction is mainly due to the presence of potassium; some consider the alkaloid fraction also has a diuretic effect. Clinically effective for patients with ascites and edema. [1]

Anti-acetylcholine: Tribulus terrestris has anti-acetylcholine effect. [1]

Tonic/anti-aging, antibacterial, anti-allergic, vitiligo: Reported strong and anti-aging effect; antibacterial, anti-allergic effects, and effect in treatment of vitiligo. [1]

Anti-ischemic: Saponins from Tribulus show significant anti-myocardial ischemic effect. [1]

Antimicrobial: Tribulus extract can inhibit growth of Staphylococcus aureus and Escherichia coli. [1] The most active extract against both Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria was the ethanol extract from the fruits, with a minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of 0.15 mg/ml against Bacillus subtilis, Bacillus cereus, Proteus vulgaris, and Corynebacterium diphtheriae. The same fruit ethanol extract showed the strongest antifungal activity against Candida albicans with an MIC of 0.15 mg/ml. [2]

Lipid and reproductive effects (animals): Crude saponins from stems and leaves significantly reduced cholesterol levels in animals with experimental hypercholesterolemia and increased the lecithin/cholesterol ratio; significantly stimulated spermatogenesis in male rats, increased libido, and improved fertility.
References: [1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao (中華本草).
[2] J Zhejiang Univ Sci B. 2008 Feb;9(2):154–159. Published online 2008 Jan 16. doi:10.1631/jzus.B0720251.

ci ji li, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

This herb may increase the luteinizinghormone which helps the development of the corpus luteum in the femaleand the production of testosterone by the interstitial cells of the testis inmale.  See Caution.有報導說，鍛煉肌肉健身者在使用白蒺藜來增加睪酮以提高鍛煉效果。本品可能會增加女性的黃體生成， 在男性有助於睪丸間質細胞產生睪酮而促進肌肉生長。Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Fructus
TribuliBiological name:拉丁文學名﹕Tribulus terrestris Linn.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音 ﹕baikuchitsuri  (白蒺藜)Pron. in Korean:韓語發音 ﹕paekchillyo (白蒺藜)Pron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕ci3 zat6 lai4Other Names:別名 ﹕yin ji li 硬蒺藜，ji gu zi 蒺骨子， bai ji li 白蒺藜， ji li  蒺藜，san jiao ding (literally: 3 legged nail) 三腳丁 ，san jiao hu(litterally 3 legged tiger) 三腳虎 ，san jiao ma zai(literally: 3 legged horse) 三腳馬仔。Common Name:外文名﹕Puncturevine caltrop fruit, nettle fruit, puncture vine fruit, cathead fruit ,yellow vine fruit, goathead fruit, and burra gokharu (Indian name).Distribution:產地﹕mainly produced in north eastern, northern part of China and in Qinghai,Xizang, and along the Yangtze River of China.產東北﹐華北﹐ 青海﹐西藏和長江流域等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕ bitter, acrid, neutral.苦﹐辛，平。 Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver.肝經。Medical functions:藥理﹕ 

Tribulus terrestris water extract has anti-inflammatory effects. Inhibitory effect on the delayed type hypersensitivity is mainly achieved through the mid-term effect on the inhibition induced cell differentiation and formation.
Tribulus terrestris has antihypertensive effect . Tribulus water extract , ethanol - water extract and 30 % ethanol leaching solution in anesthetized animals have antihypertensive effect. Its alkaloids had no effect on canine blood pressure , but can inhibit frog heart , water-soluble fraction with moderate antihypertensive effect. [ 1 ]
Tribulus terrestris has some diuretic effect. Tribulus terrestris is being used as a diuretic used in Indian folk medicine. In saline loading experiments in rats , the diuretic effect is not ideal. The diuretic effect of water extract of its ash content of the water extract and plant decoction , is mainly due to the presence of potassium . But some people think that in addition to potassium , the alkaloids have a diuretic effect. Clinically it is effective for patients with ascites and edema . [ 1 ]
Tribulus terrestris has anti- acetylcholine effect . [ 1 ]
Tribulus terrestris has a strong and anti-aging effect.Tribulus terrestris has antibacterial, anti-allergic and treatment of vitiligo effect.
Tribulus has significant anti- ischemic effect .
Tribulus terrestris extract can inhibit the growth of Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli. [ 1 ]
The crude saponins of Tribulus leaves can significantly reduce lab animal experimental hypercholesterolemia cholesterol levels , elevated lecithin / cholesterol ratio ; can significantly stimulate spermatogenesis in male rats , increased libido , improve fertility .
The most active extract against both Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria was ethanol extract from the fruits with a minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) value of 0.15 mg/ml against B. subtilis, B. cereus, P. vulgaris andC. diphtheriae. In addition, the same extract from the same plant part demonstrated the strongest antifungal activity against C. albicans with an MIC value of 0.15 mg/ml. [2]

 刺蒺藜水提取物有抗炎作用。對遲發型變態反應的抑制作用主要是通過對抑制誘導期中的效應細胞的分化 與形成而達致的。刺蒺藜有降壓作用。蒺藜水浸液、乙醇-水浸出液和30％乙醇浸出液對麻醉動物有降壓作用。其生物鹼部分對犬血壓無影響，但可抑制蛙心，水溶性部分有中度降 壓作用。[1]刺蒺藜有一定的利尿作用。白蒺藜在印度民間作為利尿劑用；在鹽水負荷的大白鼠實驗中，利尿作用並不理想，其灰分的水提取物及植物煎劑的利尿作用，主要是由 於鉀鹽的存在。但有人認為除了鉀鹽外，生物鹼部分有一定的利尿作用，臨床上對腹水及水腫病人有效。[1]刺蒺藜具有抗乙酰膽鹼作用。[1]刺蒺藜具有強壯與抗衰老作用。刺蒺藜具有抗菌、抗過敏及治療白癜風作用。蒺藜皂甙有明顯的抗心肌缺血作用。蒺藜提取物能抑制金黃色葡萄球菌、大腸桿菌的生長。[1]蒺藜莖葉粗皂苷能顯著降低實驗性高膽固醇症動物的膽固醇水平，升高卵磷脂/膽固醇比值；可明顯刺激雄性大鼠精子生成，增加性慾，提高生殖力。最活躍的蒺藜乙醇提取物對革蘭氏陰性和革蘭氏陽性菌的最小抑菌濃度， 0.15毫克/毫升， 對枯草桿菌，蠟樣芽胞桿菌，夏枯草和C的水果提取物。白喉。此外，同樣從蒺藜提取物表現出最強的對白色念珠菌的抗真菌活性為0.15毫克/毫升。 [2]Actions & Indications:主 治﹕
Effective for soothing the liver to rid of depressed mood, invigorating blood 
to rid of pain, improving vision, stopping itchiness.
Being used in treatment of：achy loin due to deficiency, spermatorrhea,
leukorrhea,headache, dizziness, pink eyes with tears, keratitis, cloudiness 
in cornea, chronic bronchitis with coughing, milk not flowing, itchiness, 
rash, bulging sensatiion in the rib cage, vitiligo, etc.
 
 
 
功效：有平肝解鬱，活血袪風，明目止癢之效。
治：虛勞腰痛 ， 遺精帶下 ， 頭痛 ，眩暈， 目赤多淚 ， 角膜炎，角膜雲翳，
咳逆肺痿 ， 癥結積聚 ， 乳閉不通 ， 皮膚瘙癢 ， 風疹 ， 胸脇脹悶，白癜風 。
 
Chemical ingredients:化 學成份﹕steroidal saponins:甾體皂甙; 其皂甙元為:diosgenin薯蕷皂甙元ruscogenin魯期可皂甙元hecogenin海可皂甙元gitoogenin吉托皂甙元Also contains:另含:tribuloside蒺藜甙kaempferol-3-rutinoside山柰酚-3-芸香糖甙astragalin紫雲英甙harmine肉葉芸香鹼Dosage:用 量﹕

for decoction: 6 to 9 g. 
for external use: smash and apply or make into powder and sprinkle into affected parts.

 

內服：6～9 克。
外用：捣敷或研末撒。

Samples of formulae:處方 舉例﹕用於風疹瘙痒，常與蟬 蛻，荊 芥，防 風等同用。Modern Research:現 代研究﹕ Cautions:禁 忌﹕use care in cases of blood deficient  and/or qixu (qi deficient)  and in cases of pregnancies.Toxic re-actions:1. overdose can cause toxic reaction: lack of energy, dizziness, nausea, vomiting, palpitation, rapid respiration, skin purpura. In serious cases it can cause lung edema, and respiration exhaustion. It can also cause high iron content in red cells and result in asphyxiate.2. There are allergic reaction of skin itchiness, rash and erythema after consuming the herb.血虛,  氣虛及 孕婦慎服。1.用量過大:用量 過大 會引起 中毒反應，出現乏力﹐頭昏﹐噁心﹐嘔吐﹐心悸﹐氣急﹐皮膚青紫﹐嚴重者出現肺 水腫﹐呼吸衰竭 。 亦可產生高鐵血紅蛋白而引起窒息。2.過敏反應:有報道服用白蒺藤後，出現皮膚瘙癢﹐丘疹﹐紅斑。[1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao    中華本草[2] J Zhejiang Univ Sci B. 2008 February; 9 (2): 154�159.
